org.wonderly.jini2.proxy
Class DynamicPolicyProxyPreparer

java.lang.Object
  org.wonderly.jini2.proxy.DynamicPolicyProxyPreparer
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProxyPreparer, ServiceProxyPreparer
public class DynamicPolicyProxyPreparer
extends Object
implements ServiceProxyPreparer

This class is a ProxyPreparer that provides the ability to match codesource to policy. The matching is done using an XML specification. A conglomeration of such XML is shown here. A DTD will be forthcoming. 


<permissions>
        <template type="all">
                <permission class="java.security.AllPermission"/>
        </template>
        <template type="unixtmpfiles">
                // file system dependent permissions for unix file system
                <permission class="java.io.FilePermission">
                        <arg>"."</arg><action>"read,write,delete"</action>
                </permission>
                <permission class="java.io.FilePermission">
                        <arg>"./-"</arg><action>"read,write,delete"</action>
                </permission>
                <permission class="java.io.FilePermission">
                        <arg>"/tmp"</arg><action>"read,write,delete"</action>
                </permission>
                <permission class="java.io.FilePermission">
                        <arg>"/tmp/-"</arg><action>"read,write,delete"</action>
                </permission>
                <permission class="java.io.FilePermission">
                        <arg>"/var/tmp"</arg><action>"read,write,delete"</action>
                </permission>
                <permission class="java.io.FilePermission">
                        <arg>"/var/tmp/-"</arg><action>"read,write,delete"</action>
                </permission>
        </template>
        <template type="discovery">
                <permission class="java.net.SocketPermission">
                        <arg>"224.0.1.84"</arg><action>"connect,accept"</action>
                </permission>
                <permission class="java.net.SocketPermission">
                        <arg>"224.0.1.85"</arg><action>"connect,accept"</action>
                </permission>
                <permission class="net.jini.discovery.DiscoveryPermission">
                        <arg>"*"</arg>
                </permission>
        </template>

        <!-- Keystore to get signing keys from for comparison -->
        <keystore location="store" type="JKS"/>

        <!-- Create principal to reference below -->
        <principal name="user" class="principal.class.name" arg="cons-arg"/>

        <!-- A code source to match -->
        <codesource 
                proto="httpmd" 
                host="localhost" port="8090"
                path="/reggie-dl.jar"
                signedby="signer-cert-alias-name"
                >
                <!-- Passed to the grant as a required principal -->
                <mustbe principal="user"/>

                <!-- Only match when this entry with this value is present -->
                <when entry="net.jini.lookup.entry.Name">
                        <attrib name="name" value="The Service Name"/>
                </when>

                <!-- Only match when the named entry's value is the indicated
                         configuration entry's value -->
                <when entry="net.jini.lookup.entry.ServiceInfo">
                        <attrib name="name" ref="package.name.configEntry"/>
                </when>

                <!-- Refer to configuration somewhere else -->
                <config name="my.package.name" url="file:/myconfig.cfg">
                        <option>http://startnow.jini.org/nonav/startdesk</option>
                </config>

                <!-- or explicitly -->
                <config name="my.package.name">
                        <data>
                        import net.jini.core.lease.*;

                        my.package.name {
                                preparer = null;
                                logger = null;
                                logLevel = null;

                        }
                        </data>
                <option>http://startnow.jini.org/nonav/startdesk</option>
                </config>

                <permission class="some.specific.Permission"/>
                <!-- or some specific group -->
                <grant type="discovery"/>
        </codesource>
</permissions>
